thread.title: Rihanna Casually Chugging Out Of A Diamond Studded Flask Is The Most Iconic Moment In Grammys History
thread.title_full: Rihanna Casually Chugging Out Of A Diamond Studded Flask Is The Most Iconic Moment In Grammys History

author: Kmarko
title: Rihanna Casually Chugging Out Of A Diamond Studded Flask Is The Most Iconic Moment In Grammys History
text:
Rihanna Casually Chugging Out Of A Diamond Studded Flask Is The Most Iconic Moment In Grammys History Kmarko | 
Most iconic Grammy moments in my lifetime – 

J.Lo’s dress. Elton John and Eminem. Kendrick Lamar last year. “Wu Tang are for the children.” 

New #1? Rihanna slugging shots from a diamond studded bedazzled flask in the middle of an insufferable 7 hour Grammys. 


Fucking love Rihanna. That first clip is by far my favorite, with the casual sneak face on: 


You know Rihanna does not give one single fuck, but the image of her trying to be sneaky is relatable as hell. 


Stars, they’re just like us, sneaking booze into boring events and dumping it down their face when nobody is looking!
